SELECT c.ChemId,c.ChemName,c.CAS,ei.EquipName,pu.UnitName,di.SourceName,ci.CompanyName,ci.Area FROM TB_BASE_CHEMICAL_INFO c LEFT JOIN TB_REL_EQUIP_CHEMICAL rc ON c.ChemId = rc.ChemId JOIN TB_BASE_EQUIP_INFO ei ON rc.EquipId=ei.EquipId JOIN TB_BASE_PROCESS_UNIT pu ON ei.UnitId=pu.UnitId JOIN TB_BASE_DANGERSOURCE_INFO di ON pu.SourceId=di.SourceId JOIN TB_BASE_COMPANY_INFO ci ON di.CompanyId=ci.CompanyId WHERE 1 = 1
AND c.chemName LIKE '%'+ #{chemName} + '%'
AND ei.equipName LIKE '%'+ #{equipName} + '%'
AND ci.companyName LIKE '%'+ #{companyName} + '%'
